DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate acute long-term safety effectiveness Left atrial appendage occlusion ( LAA ) AtriCure LAA Occlusion System . This device apply patient atrial fibrillation ( AF ) , paroxysmal , persistent permanent , undergo cardiac surgery concomitant Maze/Ablation procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Left Atrial Appendage Occlusion
DOC.criteria: 1 . Documented history ( paroxysmal , persistent permanent ) AF [ one episode within last 12 month enrollment ] 2 . Elective Maze procedure 3 . Suitable anatomy 4 . Able willing sign inform consent 5 . Age 18 year 1 . Patient Intensive Care Unit either : 1. intravenous catecholamine 2. ventilator 3. cardiac index < 1.8 l/min . 2 . Reoperative Cardiac Surgery 3 . Systemic Inflammatory disease 4 . Dialysis 5 . Recent myocardial infarction ( < 21 day ) 6 . History pericarditis 7 . Patient take part device drug study 8 . Patient known sensitivity allergy device component 9 . Pregnancy
